user_query: I'm a food enthusiast and I love trying out new recipes. Can you help me find unique and creative recipes using ingredients like avocado and quinoa? Additionally, I would like to gather nutritional information about these ingredients and explore news articles about the latest food trends.

TaskList.description: Search for unique and creative recipes that include avocado and quinoa.
Gather nutritional information for avocado and quinoa.
Explore news articles related to the latest food trends.
